website_summaries.verdict: The Sony MDR-10RBT gets you about 75 percent of the way to the Beats Studio Wireless for a lot less money.
pros: The Sony MDR-10RBT is a well-designed Bluetooth headphone, sounds good for the money, and is comfortable to wear
Battery life is rated at a solid 17 hours and the headphones come with a carrying case
cons: While the transport controls are well-placed and easy to operate, they're a little prone to accidental button pushes

customer_reviews.title: A great pair
customer_reviews.text: I've used Sony headphones in the past, and at least 1 of them was a disappointment, so when I shopped for a new one I was a bit leery of the Sony brand when it comes to headphones. Reviewers, however, were praising this line of headphones, and so I bet on them. I ended buying a refurbished pair, and they are awesome. The bass is indeed a little of an overkill (muddled), so I have to use an equalizer, at least on the PC side.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: These are great headphones. The sound quality is great on them
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones. The sound quality is great on them. The are very comfortable for all day use and do not get to hot. They are also not heavy either. The battery life is very long my my use typically 3-4 days without charging . If they do did and you still want to listen you can just use the AUX cord. Only problem is that there is no indication for how much battery is left and no warning when they die, it will just shut off.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie T. Willard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound and comfort!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have a lot of reviews by people who have far more experience than I do with headphones. Yet, I wanted to review them as I may offer a different perspective! I purchased these for my husband, a true lover of music, and he was blown-away by how amazing they sound. He told me he felt like he was in a recording studio with the band and once he placed them on my ears I knew exactly what he meant. The sound is beyond clear, and those sitting around you cannot hear a thing from the headphones, even at high volume. An excellent pair of headphones for a music lover.
customer_reviews.author: Kelle Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Reliable range is less than a couple of feet
customer_reviews.text: These headphones worked well for a couple of months, but now the range has severely decreased! I can no longer use them on my ears when my phone is in my pocket, there are constant skips and stops in the audio. Even with my phone in the breast pocket of my jacket the audio will skip! I wish I could return them, as they worked very well when they worked! I have several other pairs of wireless headphones and earbuds and the range on them is fantastic, I can go into another room and they will still work!
customer_reviews.author: E Boda

customer_reviews.title: Battery only has a 1 year life for Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: $300 headphones that last about a year and then the battery is dead forever. Don’t waste your $.
customer_reviews.author: Eirik

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, after going up the price range from 30 to 60 to 100 to 150 dollars, then I spent a little more money and got exactly what I wanted. Thank God, for Amazon's return policy, I would never have been able to do this. This is the perfect fit for me. Very comfortable and excellent sound. (before, I kept getting one or the other) Now I have both, comfort and quality sound. My third Sony headphone purchase - different levels for different reasons. It seems that Sony does it just right for me.
customer_reviews.author: GaryLH

customer_reviews.title: Can be prone to breaking
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones and it lasted approximately 48 hours. The hinge between the headstrap area and the ear cups is not as durible as it should be. Its made of a brittle plastic, when I think it should be made out of metal.
customer_reviews.author: jodeci78

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding headsets.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound. Controls are easy to use. Does not work for listening to music or movies with the PS3. The Bluetooth for the PS3 only works for voice while playing games. Doesn't hurt your ears after hours of use.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Multhaupt

customer_reviews.title: Get in the zone!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Drown out background and listen to tunes from my phone while doing the dishes or cleaning the house. Bonus I didn't realize before I bought them -- You can use it as a bluetooth mic and take calls with them too. At night sometimes I watch Netflix or Amazon shows in bed without disturbing the wife. Being able to move around the house freely while jamming out to my music is a real mood-lifter. I haven't been this happy with a product in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Eric von Rothkirch

customer_reviews.title: Lacks Volume.
customer_reviews.text: Nice headphones, I had no problems connecting to my Samsung tab3.I just wish it had more volume, but in my opinion these are much better than the bose bluetooth headphones which cost 100 bucks more.
customer_reviews.author: kbar64

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I use these headphones every day for about 8 hours and the #1 thing I can say is the comfort is the best of any I've ever had. You'll forget you have them on. I have a very large head (XXL helmet size) and these easily fit me when you extend them out. Battery life is right on their advertised for medium volume. The only con is that they don't get very loud on Bluetooth, in comparison to some others I've had. When you hook up the wire they are much more impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Colton Halbach

customer_reviews.title: Sony as usual does not disappoint. Battery life is off the hook
customer_reviews.text: First fore' into bluetooth full size headphone. Sony as usual does not disappoint. Battery life is off the hook. I run both local and streaming player from my S5 and can crank tunes and take phone calls seamlessly. Terrific sound quality. Rugged build, logical placement of buttons/controls. Only semi-comfortable wearability, with only lightly-cushioned headband. Cannot speak a negative word about another fantastic Sony pair of headphones. Much less priced than bloated-priced competition.
customer_reviews.author: Volcano King

customer_reviews.title: Certainly worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning sound, easy to connect, well designed and made. If you like mobility, Bluetooth is an additional plus, the quality - as far as I could tell from an MP3 source - does not suffer much when connected via Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Marko

customer_reviews.title: I just love this product
customer_reviews.text: I just love this product. It is perfect and suitable to my needs. Excellent sound quality and clarity. Comparable with Bose headphones at 50% less price!!!! The acoustic quality will just blow your mind.The bluetooth wireless feature is awesome and helps one to listen to music or speak on the phone while on move. The headset has got an inbuilt microphone which also works perfectly. Easy to charge, inbuilt battery is very long lasting. Also can be connected with a provided 3.5 mm jack. One of my most cherished product!!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Soumyadeep Acharya

customer_reviews.title: The sound on these headphones is high quality, but the quality of the materials is poor, and this product cost over $200
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones in October 2015 and just 2 years and 4 months later, the sound is intermittent in the right side, and also that ear pad started to tear. I am very gentle and tend to keep electronics for many years. I am on only my 4th cell phone in 25 years, and none of them broke, they just became obsolete. Very disappointed in Sony, which used to make quality products.
customer_reviews.author: George Dias

customer_reviews.title: Good battery life
customer_reviews.text: Have used it a couple of times for several hours. Battery held up. I do have to say I used it for about 5 hours one night and went back to use it the next night and my ears was a little sore so I switched to my Bose wireless speakers. I up all night and I am deaf so I play it loud and bother my neighbors. I am pleased overall. I found it difficult to pull the mini port plug out and I tried other mini plugs of my own and it did not work charging it thats why a 4
customer_reviews.author: Tom's Foolery

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: I got an incredible deal on this headphone recently. Purchased factory refurbished for 60 bucks. The headphone looks and works like brand new, just flawless. I am no audiophile so can't really break down the sound quality technically, but the headphones sound great for a Bluetooth headphone (I have the LG in ear ones and they're good too, but the sound on this one is much much better). Am extremely happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mvoice

customer_reviews.title: Very nice headphones from Sony
customer_reviews.text: I haven't purchased a pair of headphones in a long time. I went with the reviews and purchased these. I'm very happy with the quality of sound they produce and the amount of noise they seal out. I can wear them in an environment where other conversations are going on and even at minimal volume clearly hear my music or TV show. I would say I have average sized ears and they fit over mine just fine and are comfortable for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have had these headphones for atleast 6 months now and I am still very impressed with them. I have spent money in the past on bluetooth headphones and they were basically crap. These Sony headphones have great sound, are easy to pair with my tablets and phone and the battery life is remarkable. I am not sure how many hours the battery lasts, because it is just not a problem. I charge them every week or two and never worry about it. Headphones are pretty comfortable, too.
customer_reviews.author: DogSlobberererer

customer_reviews.title: As good as beats by dre if not better. They rival even the more expensive alternatives out there!!
customer_reviews.text: Super clear sound. There is a burn in effect as stated in other reviews however after a week the sound is amazing. The Bluetooth connection stays strong, the controls on the headset for track foward/back pause are pretty solid and the cushions are comfortable even after hours of use daily while at the gym. I love these headphones they rival beats and higher end headsets easily!!
customer_reviews.author: Lou Hatz

customer_reviews.title: Better than your average headphones
customer_reviews.text: After a year aterial has begun to flake potentially because of water exposure or use. Excellent sound quality, frequency range, light on bass but pretty much studio quality, better sounding and cheaper than beats headphones. As a producer, would recommend whether on budget or not.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair for Headphones for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit larger than I thought, but the noise cancellation is about the most outstanding I have ever seen. They are so quite, I have to check with the person I'm on the phone with to make sure they are still there. The controls are very easy to use while wearing the headphones. The only drawback is they are too large and cumbersome to wear while working out.
customer_reviews.author: Donald M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: These are the best Bluetooth headphones I have used to date. Very, very comfortable to wear, lightweight, long battery time, excellent sound quality, and easy to use. I would not wear these if I were exercising, but are perfect for around the house or back seat of car/bus/train/plane. For only $200 they are a great value.
customer_reviews.author: FireworksKid

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are great, I love High quality music and was afraid ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great, I love High quality music and was afraid that these headphones would not perform well due to the fact that they are bluetooth. I am impressed, I use the AKG K550 headphones for everything and I love them but I wanted to have a wireless option. These sound great especially when using a computer which supports Aptx, I can barely tell a difference in quality and they are extremely comfortable. I would recommend these to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Sony v HK BT?
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. I like trying new headphones and luv Bluetooth Aptx. My last Harmon kardon bt are starting to intermittently drop audio, no response from hk support. I saw these and thought I would try them out. They sound better than the hk and I have far more range I can go upstairs and still get sound the hk drops out if I go into the next room.... Much better value
customer_reviews.author: D215

customer_reviews.title: I can say this is the best headphones I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: After 3+ years of everyday use, I can say this is the best headphones I have ever used. Are very comfortable to wear and the sound is natural and perfectly balanced. The headband and ear cushions now show signs of wear, but have last for long considering that I use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I've ever made. Being that my new Samsung TV didn't have a plug for a wired headphones, and I have yet to connect my AV Receiver, these wireless headphones have saved the day for late night TV viewing. Another surprise is that I can go to the kitchen or out into the garage even, and not miss a bit of the dialogue. You can't even do that with normal speakers; be they TV or home theater.
customer_reviews.author: BetsyBoo

customer_reviews.title: extremely comfortable. I go on walks regularly and have not ...
customer_reviews.text: extremely comfortable. I go on walks regularly and have not noticed any decline in quality. Phone calls are heard just fine, except when it's windy. But that is expected.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: sound is great, no Bluetooth issues with my iPhone
customer_reviews.text: this is a quality product, sound is great, no Bluetooth issues with my iPhone, enough controls on the headset for basic functionality, battery seems to last a long time. highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be more happy with the headphones
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be more happy with the headphones, NFC is a big plus if you use them on several devices. Great stand by battery life and play back life. Extremely light and comfortable, the only complaint i would have is the pouch offered to store them. Luckily I had a hard case from some V-moda's i purchased earlier and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Edsson Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! LOOOOOOONG lasting battery life, sound is good (not great) but if you need something for business and pleasure and aren't after big bass or something, then these are your best bet by far over other stuff on the market. I own a few different headphones including the heavy bass wireless Sony, Bose and now these... these are my favorites for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit, excellent sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: After considerable research, settled on this pair of headphones. These are over the ear, well padded and comfortable. Easily charged and paired with Bluetooth devices. Sound quality is excellent and does actually improve with use. Would not recommend for working out/running, etc. I use them in the office and around the house.
customer_reviews.author: bobcat931

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to wear, easy to pair with multiple devices, and they do a good job of isolating outside noise. They sound great but are tuned a bit for the low side and the highs suffer as a result. I wouldn't call them overly bassy however, the lows are clean and sharp. Considering their high price I can't really recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B Hokanson

customer_reviews.title: is excellent. I cannot afford $300+ dollar headphones
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding for the price, they always connect via bluetooth without any issue. And the sound quality, in particular when wired, is excellent. I cannot afford $300+ dollar headphones, but didn't want cheap ear buds either. This is a great compromise.
customer_reviews.author: art4ever

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: I'm no audiophile, so the sound is good enough for me. There are a lot of other reviews that go into depth in terms of operation, so I'll just say that it works well, the construction is of noticeably good quality, and it's easy to use. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kawakami

customer_reviews.title: and definitely went with the 10rbt as they are so much more comfortable and the 950s are just flooded with
customer_reviews.text: Cant get enough of these. Very well balanced sound. I tried the MDRXB950BT/B, and definitely went with the 10rbt as they are so much more comfortable and the 950s are just flooded with base
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: We really enjoy these. Sound is excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: We really enjoy these. Sound is excellent quality. Phone answering option is nice. We also use them via the computer so someone and listen to you-tube and not interrupt everyone else in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Nice headphones with a great battery life. They really sound good, especially when you break them in. They also got very well over the ear.
customer_reviews.author: steve thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and they work flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and they work flawlessly. I used them for 8-10 hours a day and I can typically get 2+ days worth of charge out of them. The built in microphone is nice for making phone calls on the VOIP phone as well.
customer_reviews.author: Freakin Ward Love

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones! I love the wireless feature
customer_reviews.text: Nice headphones ! I love the wireless feature, teh sound quality is very good. I use them to listen to streamed movies at home, also music in teh gym. They are light enough for that, but I take them off when I start sweating too profusely
customer_reviews.author: John R. Washington

customer_reviews.title: Great product new. However beware of refurbished units.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a refurbished headset and it came broken out of the box. However, I purchased a brand new one from best buy and it is fantastic. It's a good buy with great sound at a fraction of the cost of Bose or Beats. The battery lasts 17 hours too. Five stars for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: William Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Light headphones and great battery life
customer_reviews.text: Extremely light and easy to pair with any Bluetooth device. I currently use them with my iPhone 5s. The battery lasts quite long. I only use them while commuting to and from work (about 1 - 2 hours a day) and only need to charge them twice a month.
customer_reviews.author: Ayumu

customer_reviews.title: hands down the best over the ear head blue tooth headphones you can ...
customer_reviews.text: hands down the best over the ear head blue tooth headphones you can buy. way more comfortable than Beats, and better looking than Bose. sound quality is great. The Microphone works good too, so the work good as a gaming headset too.
customer_reviews.author: Navin C

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: These sound great, are comfortable to wear, and are easy to charge and connect! They're not noise canceling, but the cushion around the ear does a pretty great job of blocking external sounds. Love that you can even take calls with them when connected to your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole in CA

customer_reviews.title: Best earphones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ear phones Very comfortable Rapid Bluetooth synch Reasonably priced Great sound quality Highly recommended Better then the Bose and cheaper
customer_reviews.author: ska

customer_reviews.title: Love them.. !
customer_reviews.text: I looked around for headphones that had both bluetooth and would work with a cable. These sound awesome. They don't have ANC, but do seal around the ears very well. I hope they last as long as my KOSS Pro4AA's did. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: VASteve

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and the battery works for a week with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding headphones for the money. With an iPhone, it's transmitting 150kbps AAC decoded on the headphones itself. Very comfortable and the battery works for a week with a few hours use a day. Couldn't be any happier!
customer_reviews.author: Ash in Vancouver

customer_reviews.title: very good headphones, they sound good from day one but ...
customer_reviews.text: very good headphones, they sound good from day one but better after a week or so, I wear this every day at work sometimes not even listening to music just to keep the noise from machines out, that's because this headphones don't bother my ears at all.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ari

customer_reviews.title: Solid Choice and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Solid headphones, the sound is rich and consistent. Works great with cord or bluetooth. Long battery life also the N-near field communication is a nice touch. Has nice pouch and comes with cord.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: These are my son's new go-to earphones. And he ...
customer_reviews.text: These are my son's new go-to earphones. And he is tuned in constantly! Not having to deal with wires is a Godsend, since broken wires always resulted in the earphones having to be discarded.
customer_reviews.author: DiMaster

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound!
customer_reviews.text: I can drown out my whiny kids! Great base, great sound and treble. There are many other more expensive headsets. This one I highly recommend instead of paying more for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Fab

customer_reviews.title: ... are my first bluetooth headphones & they have not disappointed. They sound amazing wired & great via bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: The MDR10RBT's are my first bluetooth headphones & they have not disappointed. They sound amazing wired & great via bluetooth, with only a slight drop in sound quality. But this is to be expected with most bluetooth headsets. The sound quality actually did improve for me after some some heavy usage.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Ear to Ear
customer_reviews.text: Well there is a a lot good to say but let me just share that they could not connect to my receiver. Otherwise I enjoy them very much!
customer_reviews.author: Rdubbu

customer_reviews.title: These are the best headphones I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: These are the best headphones I have ever owned. I have only charged them once (when I got them) and have used them every night since. They are perfect for travelling. They don't bleed much sound at all, so they are great for confined spaces like airplanes and cars. They can achieve great volume too, so you don't have to worry about the music being too quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Justus

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality and very comfortable circum-aural cans. No static during silence in tracks or while deciding what next to play. Just in handling them, they feel like quality construction. Being able to use them with a physical connection to an audio source is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: D M A

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wireless headphones. Can easily pair to any of the devices we have around the house. The kids love them to use while doing homework.
customer_reviews.author: Jim in Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: YOWIE!!! Comfortable, tremendous sound, easy on the headphone controls. Advance to next song, replay the last song, adjust volume...all simple and intuitive. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Woody Carver

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: I like these. They are a good fit and are less expensive then the other headphones out there. I havent had a chacne to fly with them yet. I feel like they will work well on the plane as well
customer_reviews.author: Greg g

customer_reviews.title: Great-sounding, versatile, and comfortable headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of Sony MDR10RBT headphones as a gift for my girlfriend and she enjoys them thoroughly. I have had opportunities to try them and I can see why she likes them so much. They provide crisp and clear sound. They are comfortable and appear sturdy and well made. And they are versatile: plug these headphones into your computer for phone or video calls, or plug them into your receiver or amplifier to listen to music or watch movies. Or use bluetooth to connect them wirelessly to a bluetooth-enabled phone or receiver. If I decide to buy a pair of headphones for myself, I'll purchase this model.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: If Sony would make more stuff like this! Very good sound, very comfortable, good battery life, good range, pretty durable, extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: hr1$

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work great for listing to music, not so great for watching tv because of the delay.
customer_reviews.author: Oats

customer_reviews.title: Super Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I am no audiophile but these headphones are awesome. Easy connection to all devices. Great sound and fantastic comfort. Only downside was I had to wait forever to get them since they were back ordered.
customer_reviews.author: raybo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better sound than the Bose AE2w, but not as comfortable, so I stuck with the Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones fit great and feel good. The sound quality is excellent and is even slightly better with the optional audio cable. The battery seems to last a long while also.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gahagan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband has not taken them off since he got them loves them
customer_reviews.author: Janice Reading

customer_reviews.title: I love not having the wires but the headphones seem to ...
customer_reviews.text: I love not having the wires but the headphones seem to go in and out. Even when my ipod is right in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: eimi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product. Sound, comfort, design all great, battery life could be better of course.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. The model I bought does not have noise ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. The model I bought does not have noise cancelling, but they feel great and can be worn for extended periods.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Everything I was looking for in wireless headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using LG Tone+ (HBS-730) for years now, because nothing wireless outdid it. However, I hate earphones, and even turned to KickStarter to find a solution. These puppies came out, and suddenly, I find myself with headphones that work great in the plane, during a commute, and while working for hours. I am just astounded by the flexibility and reliability. The battery is wonderful, the quality is great, and I have yet to rewind my podcasts when a loud sound passes me by. I'm excited and ecstatic about these headphones. If you are looking for a bluetooth headset, just get these. All future headphones will be based on this standard.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended even though the price tag is a bit high
customer_reviews.text: After almost a year of constant use , both at home and in the office I can say with a confidence - this product rocks! Audio quality is superb for a Bluetooth device, battery life is great and the ear cushions are super comfortable. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Shlomi Korali

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sound quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sound quality for the money. I sue these because I broke my plug on my laptop by leaving my headphones plugged in and of course it fell. I didn't feel like paying to have the motherboard fixed. I should have bought these a while back. As long as you have bluetooth on your laptop or phone these are comfortable, light weight, and work perfect for my needs. I watch a lot of movies when I travel and these will work nicely. The pouch it comes with is kinda cheesy but it keeps everything all together. I really like these.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Soft and comfortable but sturdy. Good sound. Happy with them, and think the price was very fair.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Colleen

customer_reviews.title: great sound and great price
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it every day and battery last very long. great sound and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. Very comfortable, great sound and great looks. Frequency response is great, tested both with low frequencies and high ones. The option to use the headphone with the 3.5mm plug is great. The included carrying pouch doesn't really protect from anything but scratches and the included usb cable could be longer, but that would just be a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Fragni

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellant woeks great controls easy to access love it nice things to have nice no wires
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price. Super comfortable and lightweight. Great sound
customer_reviews.author: Carol M

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves these so he doesn't have to worry about cords no matter if he is mowing the yard or just relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: JR Avery

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my non technical father and he figured ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my non technical father and he figured out the blue tooth without any issues and loves them!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. ODonnell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Budget BT headphone yet deliver good value.good battery life too
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Low

customer_reviews.title: but I think I love the "quiet" more
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband to use with his computer while he plays video games and watches movies. He loves them, but I think I love the "quiet" more!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Parente

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Sound
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable & the sound is incredible! I bought it as a gift and I’m getting one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: JoeScuba

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift. Excellent sound and comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Dana C. Christian

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headphones, been using for over a year. Not the best bluetooth mic, people can't hear me at times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy hearing my favorite playlist in it
customer_reviews.text: Literally cannot hear my wife calling me out. I enjoy hearing my favorite playlist in it. Totally worth the money. Lot of research and finally wonderful experience.
customer_reviews.author: Prasad Rao

customer_reviews.title: Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Headphones crystal clear while using connection wire. I feel I need to go to the phone store to get it "blutooth connected" to my Kindle and phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Case

customer_reviews.title: Just all around great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this product with first sight. Great bass and if you want some nice loud headphones with clarity these are the ones. Just give it an hour and a half charge when you get them and they'll be good. comfortable too
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound and the bluetooth works flawlessly. It's a great product so far.
customer_reviews.author: William Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: better for travel
customer_reviews.text: they where okay the sound quality was nice but was not a lot of bass... more for use for travel and long airplane rides. people say that when I talk with them on Bluetooth sounds like in in a tunnel. so I guess there okay. but not what I expected for 160.00. I like my LG earphones better.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier S.

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Sony's warranty in sound and quality in everything they do. These headphones can hear great, thanks sony. They are the best
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: a Little Hot in the Summer, but Amazing Sound and Build Quality
customer_reviews.text: Mainly the title covers it. These headphones are great. They even have a mic built in for phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my husband for Christmas and he absolutely loves them. Just the right size and clarity of the sound. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Michell Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Works as designed. They are comfortable and links quickly to Bluetooth transmitters. I get great battery life and often do not have to recharge for days. I bought two of these because of this concern but it is unwarranted: I never had to stop in the middle of anything to recharge. The sound is clear and professional. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Walter W. Olson, Ph.D, P.E.

customer_reviews.title: Basic
customer_reviews.text: Very basic but im not complaining. it has nice audio and comfortable ear cuffs
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Bahena

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Excelente product, very strong signal. Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Eider Orias Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of headphones and its great that you can use the cord after the battery dies
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: These Headphones are insane... Half the price of Bose, equivalent sound quality, lighter, better battery, and you don't look like a douche try hard.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Very poor design. One of the tabs holding the earpiece ...
customer_reviews.text: Very poor design. One of the tabs holding the earpad to the phones broke the third time I used them. Just pulled the phones out of their bag and the foam piece came off in my hand. Would never recommend these earphone and probably not the supplier if they did such a poor job of refurbishing them.
customer_reviews.author: John Hebley

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, but could be more comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, but could be more comfortable and also have guarantee worldwide. Hearing music with cable is better.
customer_reviews.author: Nepows

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set of wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: Really amazing set of headphones, pairs with my note 4 phone seamlessly. For desktop/workstation I would advise getting a dedicated bluetooth dongle. Love these things.
customer_reviews.author: Zebulon

customer_reviews.title: Fine when connected with the cable
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a pair of these and for some reason the volume is really weak when connected via bluetooth. Fine when connected with the cable, same situation on PC or Iphone. Ideas?
customer_reviews.author: Richard Boe

product_meta.title: Sony MDR10RBT Bluetooth Wireless Headphones
product_meta.description:
PREMIUM BLUETOOTH WIRELESS HEADPHONES
Unmistakable Sony sound. Superior comfort. Wireless freedom. They’re everything great headphones should be. Cut the cord with Bluetooth audio streaming and easy, one-touch listening with NFC. Bring out the most in your music with wide-frequency, 40mm drivers and Beat Response Control for strong bass. With super comfortable ear pads, plus 17 hours of battery life, these headphones don’t miss a beat—and neither will you.

STREAM YOUR MUSIC WIRELESSLY2
Listen wirelessly to your favorite tunes on compatible Bluetooth 3.0 audio devices with integrated Bluetooth A2DP, advanced audio distribution profile support.2

ONE-TOUCH LISTENING WITH NFC
Enjoy simplified Bluetoothconnectivity with Near Field Communications (NFC) technology. Align and touch NFC logos to: activate Bluetooth, pair devices, and stream music. When done, align and touch the NFC logos to disconnect.3

MAXIMIZE YOUR MUSIC
Enjoy a quality Bluetooth audio streaming experience3 with your compatible music devices: digital music players, smartphones, tablet, or computer. With built-in AAC and apt-XCodec support, you will benefit from maximized signal quality when streaming music wirelessly.

ENJOY BROAD FREQUENCY RESPONSE
Newly-developed 40mm driver units deliver broad, balanced, and accurate sound reproduction for an exceptional listening experience.

TIGHT BASS RESPONSE
The Beat Response Control design delivers tight and deep bass response, just perfect for today’s music.

ENJOY EXTENDED COMFORT
Pressure-relieving cushions wrap around your ears for a comfortable acoustic seal and powerful bass response.

SWIVEL FUNCTION FOR IMPROVED PORTABILITY
And for when the music is over, swivel earcups fold flat and compact for enhanced portability.

ENJOY LONG BATTERY LIFE
A built-in rechargeable battery provides up to 17 hours of wireless functionality.4When your battery is out of charge, passive mode lets you continue listening to your headphones in a conventional fashion.

DETACHABLE CORD SUPPLIED
A conventional audio cable is perfect for plugging into your digital music player or computer.

CARRYING POUCH
A carrying pouch is included to keep your headphones and accessories secure.

PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS
 * Driver Unit:40 mm, dome type (CCAW adopted) diaphragm
 * Frequency Response:Effective range via Bluetooth/NFC mode: 20 - 20,000 Hz 
   Effective range via wired/passive mode: 4 - 40,000 Hz
 * Noise Level:ON/OFF switch on ear-cup
 * Power Handling Capacity:1000 mW
 * Selectivity:One-touch Listening with NFC
   Manual Bluetoothpairing
 * Sensitivity (db):100 dB/mW (Passive use)
 * Volume Control:Yes
 * Case Type:Carrying Pouch
 * Design:Circum Aural, Bluetooth Wireless
 * Headband:Metallic Band
 * Magnet:High-energy Neodymium
 * Plug:One L-shaped mini plug supplied: Gold-plated, stereo
 * Type of Use:Portable and Home
 * Cord:One single-sided, tangle-free cord: Stereo, detachable
 * Headphone Type:Closed supra-aural, Dynamic
 * Microphone:Omni directional, electret condenser (100 - 4 kHz frequency range
   -40 dB (0 dB = 1 V/Pa)
 * Remote Control:Via AVRCP: Play, Stop, Pause, FF, FR
 * Battery Charging (Approx):Appox. 2.5 hours from empty to full
 * Battery Indicator:LED (Red/Blue)
 * Battery Life (Approx):Up to 17 hours continuous music playback or communication time, up to 450 hours standby time (approx.)1
 * Battery Type:Built-in Lithium ion rechargeable battery
 * Power Source:DC 3.6 V Built-in Lithium-Ion rechargeable battery
 * Impedance:40 ohms at 1 kHz (Passive mode)
 * Sound Enhancer:SBC, AAC, and Apt-X codec support
 * Cord Length (Approx.):Stereo Connecting Cable-47 1/4 in. (1.2 m)
 * Weight (Approx.):Approx. 7.41 oz. (210 g) - included rechargeable battery
 * Bluetooth Technology:Bluetooth specification Version 3.01
   2.4 GHz band (2.4000 GHz-2.4835 GHz
   FHSS
 * NFC:One-touch Listening with NFC (Near Field Communications)
 * Network Transport Protocol:A2DP (Sampling frequency 44.1 kHz)
   Transmission Range: 20-20,000 Hz
   Line of sight approx.30 ft (10 m)







1Compatible with Android 4.0 Devices supporting CTIA 3.5 mm standard and ICS or later. Availability of the “VoiceOver” feature depends on the iPhone and its software version. Button functionality may vary depending on the smartphone.2Subject to app terms and conditions.3Interoperability and compatibility among Bluetooth devices may vary.4Actual performance varies based on settings, environmental conditions, and usage.
 2013 Sony Electronics, Inc. All rights reserved. Reproduction in whole or in part without written permission is prohibited. Sony and the Sony make.believe logo are trademarks of Sony. Apple is a registered trademark of Apple Inc. Android and the Android logo are trademarks of Google Inc. Bluetooth and the Bluetooth logo are trademarks of Bluetooth SIG, Inc. The N Mark is a registered trademark of NFC Forum, Inc. All other trademarks are trademarks of their respective owners. Features and specifications are subject to change without notice.
feature_bullets: Detachable cord supplied. No noise cancelling feature.
